member.name: NL_ROUTE_ORIGIN
member.summary: The NL_ROUTE_ORIGIN enumeration type defines the origin of the IP route.

member.name: NL_ROUTE_ORIGIN.NlroManual
member.summary: The route is a result of manual configuration.

member.name: NL_ROUTE_ORIGIN.NlroWellKnown
member.summary: The route is a well-known route.

member.name: NL_ROUTE_ORIGIN.NlroDHCP
member.summary: The route is a result of DHCP configuration.

member.name: NL_ROUTE_ORIGIN.NlroRouterAdvertisement
member.summary: The route is a result of router advertisement.

member.name: NL_ROUTE_ORIGIN.Nlro6to4
member.summary: The route is a result of 6to4 tunneling.
